text: Thor Steinar is a German clothing company. It trades as Thor Steinar Mediatex GmbH which is a subsidiary of International Brands General Trading based in Dubai. In Germany, it is considered that the company is closely associated to neo-Nazism by the Verfassungschutz of the state of Brandenburg.Scene costumes for right-wing extremists , from the official Web pages of the state of Brandenburg (in German). In German media, the brand is oftenly discussed in the light of this association. Wearing Thor Steinar clothes is expressly forbidden in the Bundestag, in the Landtage of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern and Saxony and in many football stadiums. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2002 establishments in Germany Category:German fashion designers Category:Neo-Nazism Category:Brandenburg Category:Manufacturing companies of Germany
title: Thor Steinar
